person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Senegal 's President Abdou Diouf said on Friday he was proposing his foreign minister Moustapha Niasse for the post of United Nations secretary-general .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Person" entities:

1. Abdou Diouf - President of Senegal
2. Moustapha Niasse - Foreign minister of Senegal (proposed for the post of United Nations secretary-general)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Sure! Here are the entities that refer to a "Person" in the given paragraph:

1. Abdou Diouf - President of Senegal
2. Moustapha Niasse - Foreign minister of Senegal (proposed for the post of United Nations secretary-general)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities that refer to a "Person" in the given paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Person":

| Person |
| --- |
| Abdou Diouf |
| Moustapha Niasse |
